ports.name: type
ports.text: Type of the oscillator, either `sine`, `square`, `sawtooth` or `triangle`

ports.name: frequency
ports.text: Frequency of the oscillator in Hertz. If you want to produce a certain tone, you can look up its frequency [here](http://www.phy.mtu.edu/~suits/notefreqs.html). Try something between `30` (very low) and `7000` (very high).

ports.name: audio out
ports.text: Audio output which contains the generated sound, can be connected to the Ops.WebAudio.Output op e.g.
